channel.title: Server Help With Tele Commands
channel.description:
Okay , i want to change my home tele in mage book,and when you login on a new acc how can you make it go to the place you want, also when i jail some1 they can still type ::home and go to home how can i fix that? thanks
-Italia Kid

item.title: Server Help With Tele Commands
item.dc:creator: @italia_kid italia kid
item.description:
@italia_kid wrote:

[quote=“Chassy13, post:4, topic:345423”]Change the coordinates of the home teleport in clickingMost.java, assuming you are using that source.

Check for something such as //initial x and y coordinates of the player in Player.java, and change those to where you want the player to be when they log in.

Use a boolean that returns true for coordinates of the jail, and false for anywhere outside of the jail, then check the boolean in your ::home command. You’ll have to know about booleans in Java if you wish to do this, as I am not going to spoon-feed you the code.[/quote]
Ive Fixed All Except The Jail Thingy Can You Delete This Post Please? thanks for your help!

Read full topic

item.title: Server Help With Tele Commands
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Change the coordinates of the home teleport in clickingMost.java, assuming you are using that source.

Check for something such as //initial x and y coordinates of the player in Player.java, and change those to where you want the player to be when they log in.

Use a boolean that returns true for coordinates of the jail, and false for anywhere outside of the jail, then check the boolean in your ::home command. You’ll have to know about booleans in Java if you wish to do this, as I am not going to spoon-feed you the code.

Read full topic

item.title: Server Help With Tele Commands
item.dc:creator: @italia_kid italia kid
item.description:
@italia_kid wrote:

[quote=“Chassy13, post:2, topic:345423”]1. clickingMost.java

  1. Player.java

  2. Check to see if they are in the coordinates of the jail before teleporting you[/quote]

This Doesnt Help Much,Like What Do I Have To Do In Player.java And Clickingmost.Java and i dont under stand “3.”

Read full topic

item.title: Server Help With Tele Commands
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

  1. clickingMost.java

  2. Player.java

  3. Check to see if they are in the coordinates of the jail before teleporting you
